title: Chile Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Chile increased to 15.05 percent in October from 14.54 percent in September of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Chile averaged 7.96 percent from 2002 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 15.15 percent in October of 2008 and a record low of 4.44 percent in September of 2020. In the Chile, the bank lending rate is the average rate of interest charged on short term loans by commercial banks to companies. This page provides - Chile Bank Lending Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco Central de Chile
